data.title: Bikies, underworld figures and the CFMEU takeover of construction
authors: Nick McKenzie, David Marin-Guzman, Ben Schneiders
data.meta_description: ‘It’s a cancer that spreads ... we’ll all pay for it’: This is the investigation into CFMEU power that prompted union boss John Setka to quit.
data.text:
Nick McKenzie, David Marin-Guzman and Ben Schneiders

Jul 13, 2024 – 5.00am

EmailLinkedInTwitterFacebook

Powerful construction union boss John Setka has stood down amid a raft of explosive allegations of misconduct facing himself and his union.
